definition: to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: bu4 que4 ding4 xing4 yuan2 li3

sentences.english: At last, the general equation for separation of high order definite err…
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了分離多階確定性誤差的通式。

sentences.english: It is possible to make qualitative distinctions of worth.
sentences.chinese: 是能對價值進行定性區分的。

sentences.english: Or have scientists been sexing up the risks and playing down the uncertainties?
sentences.chinese: 或者科學家對風險添油加醋，而貶低了不確定性？

sentences.english: The stability of colour and depth of shade were improved by after-treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通過後處理提高了熱轉印布樣的顏色穩定性和深度。

sentences.english: The article conducts the research using method of the quota statistics and qualitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章運用定量統計和定性分析的方法進行研究。

sentences.english: Soybean isoflavones and procyanidins have be provided with reliable storage stability in Health Vino.
sentences.chinese: 大豆異黃酮與原花青素在保健酒中具有較好的穩定性。

sentences.english: The adaptive law using stability theory is derived.
sentences.chinese: 按李雅普諾夫穩定性理論設計自適應控制器。

sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨過後相當長時間，滑坡才能恢復到雨前的穩定性。

sentences.english: Limitedly resistant to strong acid, strong alkali, strong oxidizing solution and strong solvent.
sentences.chinese: 而且更具有很高的熱穩定性，抗強鹼性及抗強溶劑性。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子篩預先經鹼處理，能夠明顯改善催化劑穩定性。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ether soaking method can be used for the qualitative analysis of volatile oil from Lignum Santali.
sentences.chinese: 乙醚浸漬法可用於檀香揮發油的定性分析。

sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通過添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的穩定性很強。

sentences.english: The results show that the vortex motion is unstable for small three-dimensional disturbances in the separated wake of a circular cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，圓柱分離尾跡中的旋渦存在三維不穩定性。

sentences.english: If negativity does happen, it will probably come unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 如果否定性發生，它將意想不到地大概來。

sentences.english: As a result, significantly impact on the stability of the solder.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，就大大影響了焊錫的穩定性。

sentences.english: The instability of morphological variation in flower of Z. grandiflora might be related to transposable genetic element.
sentences.chinese: 花形變異的不穩定性可能與轉座遺傳因子有關。

definition: to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
